channel.title: Selected Projects on victoria.dev
channel.description: Recent content in Selected Projects on victoria.dev

item.title: ApplyByAPI.com
item.author: hello@victoria.dev (Victoria)
item.description: A relevant, automated, and effective pre-screening tool for hiring technical candidates. ApplyByAPI is built to be a scalable solution that greatly reduces human time and effort spent on the hiring process. Python, Django, AWS, Stripe API, jQuery

item.title: Introduction, a theme for Hugo
item.author: hello@victoria.dev (Victoria)
item.description: Responsive, full-featured, and customizable theme for the popular static site generator Hugo. Focused on minimalism and adaptability. Open source on GitHub. SCSS, Go, Node.js, jQuery

item.title: Make your Tweets ephemeral
item.author: hello@victoria.dev (Victoria)
item.description: A function for AWS Lambda that continuously deletes Tweets from your Twitter timeline according to a configurable expiry time. Read the accompanying article. Go, AWS Lambda, Twitter API

item.title: A post-apocalyptic Simon game
item.author: hello@victoria.dev (Victoria)
item.description: A reinvention of the classic Simon game with an RPG theme, implemented in JavaScript as a finite-state machine. Offers a choice of play modes with custom CSS effects.

item.title: A Unicode-to-fancy-letters converter
item.author: hello@victoria.dev (Victoria)
item.description: A single-page app that instantly converts plain-looking letters into their fancier extended Unicode character representations. It uses an algorithm based on the Caesar cipher from classical cryptography. Further details in this article.

item.title: More open source projects
item.author: hello@victoria.dev (Victoria)
item.description: To fully immerse yourself in the delectable smorgasbord that is my complete open source project work, visit my GitHub page.
